main.name: Ben Nolan
main.bio: My name is Ben, I am a software developer that serves the Kansas City area. I design and develop websites, desktop, and mobile applications. My focus is to research a customers' needs and requirements. The research will help me design a mockup that is user friendly for the consumer. I utilize the findings from the research and design phases for the production of specific products including materials, systems, and methods. The research and designs will help me produce user friendly and successful products for the customer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

work.title: Implementation Project Lead
work.description: Building and managing dealership websites and projects.

work.title: Digital Strategist
work.description: Managing dealership website accounts and advertising.
